page.title: 16Population
page.content: With the decline of industry in the area the population has become static. There appears to be no immediate likelihood of growth in housing or trade.With the enormous expansion of the steel works in the first half of this century the population was heavily weighted with young families with young children.There has been a significant decline in the birth rate in the last ten years.There is now an increasing number of elderly people in the community with a consequent need for services.The farming population has remained static although some farms have been amalgamated into larger units.A survey done by the children showed that most families in Barrow Hill have only one or two children.
